import React, { Component } from 'react'; class InvoiceDetails extends Component { today = () => { var today = new Date(); var dd = today.getDate(); var mm = today.getMonth() + 1; //January is 0! var yyyy = today.getFullYear(); if (dd < 10) { dd = '0' + dd; } if (mm < 10) { mm = '0' + mm; } var today = dd + '/' + mm + '/' + yyyy; return today; } render() { console.log(this.props); return (
{/*
Hóa Đơn: {this.today()} Trạng thái:
Madalinskiego 8
71-101 Szczecin, Poland

Phone: +48 444 666 3333

Attn: Daniel Marek
43-190 Mikolow, Poland
Email: marek@daniel.com
Phone: +48 123 456 789
# Item Description Unit Cost Qty Total
1 Origin License Extended License $999,00 1 $999,00
2 Custom Services Instalation and Customization (cost per hour) $150,00 20 $3.000,00
3 Hosting 1 year subcription $499,00 1 $499,00
4 Platinum Support 1 year subcription 24/7 $3.999,00 1 $3.999,00
Subtotal $8.497,00
Discount (20%) $1,699,40
VAT (10%) $679,76
Total $7.477,36
*/}
); } } export default InvoiceDetails;
